alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Gosper; Phelps (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 2:16AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Phelps, northeastern Gosper and southern Dawson Counties through 245 AM CDT... At 216 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Elwood to 6 miles northeast of Bertrand. Movement was north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Elwood around 220 AM CDT. Overton around 235 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Lexington. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 227 and 249. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
